item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Well, I got a P2P video chat program I wrote a while back with Delphi, I was thinking I lost it but just found it in a CVS repository while cleaning up one of the machines I maintained.
I think this is a good place to start with, as the music player is a little bit more in terms of features. Also, converting things from Delphi (Pascal) to Ada should be easier compare with C/C++.
item.content:encoded:
Well, I got a P2P video chat program I wrote a while back with Delphi, I was thinking I lost it but just found it in a CVS repository while cleaning up one of the machines I maintained.

I think this is a good place to start with, as the music player is a little bit more in terms of features. Also, converting things from Delphi (Pascal) to Ada should be easier compare with C/C++.
